p: In this method, overnight fasted mice of both sexes with normal blood glucose levels (BGL) were divided into eight groups ( n = 6). The positive control group received standard antidiabetic drug (glibenclamide 10 mg/kg), while the negative control group received the vehicle [2% tween 80 (10 ml/kg)], and the test groups were administered with the aqueous extract of 150 mg/kg, 300 mg/kg, and 600 mg/kg; and essential oil of 150 mg/kg, 300 mg/kg, and 600 mg/kg of T. serrulatus as per body weight of the mice.
